data.title: Shakira
data.meta_description: Read all about Shakira with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Learned to belly dance at the age of 4

Moved to Bogotá, Colombia, at 13 to pursue a modeling career, but ended up signing a recording contract with Sony Music Colombia

Starred in the Colombian telenovela El Oasis in 1994

Gloria Estefan helped in the translation of "Ojos Así" for Shakira's first English-language album, Laundry Service

In 2003, Mattel launched a Shakira doll

Received a UN humanitarian award in 2006 for starting Barefoot, a Colombian charity that helps children escape violence

Launched the beauty line "S by Shakira" in 2010

Appointed by Barack Obama to serve on the Advisory Commission on Education Excellence for Hispanics in 2011

Awarded a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 2011

Often performs barefoot in concert
